job_details.degree_required: Bachelor or Master's Degree in Computer Science

jd: From: Raghuteja, W3Global raghu.miriyala@w3global.com Reply to: raghu.miriyala@w3global.com Job - Fullstack Developer Duration - Fulltime Location - Houston, TX Need - GC USC Job Post Description Responsibilities • Design and implementation of new features and core components • Refactoring and continuous improvement of existing functionality • Requirements analysis and clarification • Communication with US team members on a daily basis • Participation in a SCRUM-based project development Mandatory Skills • 5+ years of experience with .Net/C# or Python • 3+ years of experience with microservices development • 3+ years of experience with AKS, K8S, or similar systems • 5+ years of experience with Azure cloud development • Advanced knowledge of OOP, design patterns, SOLID principles • Azure Service Bus, RabbitMQ, or other message brokers' experience • Performance profiling and optimization experience • Experience with Azure DevOps/TFS and Git source control • MS SQL Server strong experience • TypeScript development • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and debugging skills • Bachelor or Master's Degree in Computer Science • Upper-Intermediate English Nice to Have Skills • Vanilla JavaScript knowledge • Bootstrap, Angular CLI, Reactive Extensions for Angular • Web API/RESTful server development using ASP.NET core • Azure Cloud Development • IaC and Terraform experience • Experience with Azure DevOps/TFS and Git • Understanding of Agile development methodologies • Oil & Gas domain knowledge • RXJS
